title: Global Borderlands (Victoria Reyes)
dc:creator: Queens Podcast Lab
description: In today's episode of The Annex, we interview, Victoria Reyes (University of California, Riverside). We talk about her new, widely acclaimed book, Global Borderlands: Fantasy, Violence, and Empire in Subic Bay, Philippines with Stanford University Press.
itunes:subtitle: In today's episode of The Annex, we interview, Victoria Reyes (University of California, Riverside).  We talk about her new, widely acclaimed book, Global Borderlands: Fantasy, Violence, and Empire in Subic Bay, Philippines with Stanford University Press.
